about_the_game: Precise, puzzle platformer where you play as ball only able to move left and right. The game includes a plethora of levels of different types: Multiplayer coop levels at which multiple players have to work together to clear a level, multiplayer pvp levels where players have to face against each other for cosmetics and other prizes, and single player levels for one person to complete. Each level is either a standard platformer or minigame level. Throughout all levels, physics is used and is integral to beating levels. Within the culmination of all of this, each level will be entirely unique, to maintain the puzzle aspect where each level requires a specific solution that the players must sound out.
